replies.msg:
第8個post

大家可以盡力打上R7 賽季末就有15鎖匙作獎勵

iOS版下載連結: https://apps.apple.com/hk/app/gwent-the-witcher-card-game/id1466943149
Android版下載連結:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cdprojektred.gwent
歡迎鍾意Witcher世界觀或者Card game既你黎加入昆特大家庭

新手請先用少少時間睇新手指南：
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YVLvf5HkXcjVTuPbescfTKhIkwkcoKwsc-S3mwVfNMY

replies.msg:
唔知係有無cop我之前副deck
Lock+seize用落我覺得有d卡手

打SY
-Vincent用黎捉Savolla
-Lambert殺defenders
-Tourney Joust/Assassination用黎殺雞
-Sweers偷鬼船

打NR (Swarm)
-Vincent夾lock/毒
-Lambert用黎殺牛/calvary

反而打Draug/ST有d煩
因為呢副野係打單體buff勁
draug無限loop/ST 隻隻都高點就會難打
可以換入yrden/igni

而家入左張Deithwen Arbalest Banish graveyard
可以用黎counter MO consume/雙ball
另外打NG雙ball 第一次出ball寧願消牌都唔好用bomb heaver
bomb heaver一定要留黎炸第2張
